messages.content: Every vote for Colin Clark is a vote against Indyref2

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To stand firm against the SNP's plans for another divisive independence referendum.
Fight for taxes raised locally to be spent locally. Aberdeenshire needs its fair share of Government grant.
Support and continue fighting for our North East Farming, Food and Drink sectors.
Keeping North East Employment at the forefront of the Government agenda.
To lobby for full coverage of Broadband. The UK Government has provided the funding.
Back Oil and Gas workers playing their part to develop renewables, carbon capture and achieve net zero.

mentions.candidate: Every vote for Colin Clark is a vote against Indyref2
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Corbyn could back new indyref 'as early as 2021', Swinson: I could prop up a new Labour leader, even with Indyref2
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Colin Clark can beat the SNP here, Labour last night declared it would not block a second Scottish independence referendum, LABOUR AND THE LIBDEMS ARE JUST TOO WEAK TO BEAT THE SNP
